Web Haiku 5th July 13

05 July 2013 Tags: web, haiku, and javascript

Web Haiku

Inspired by the upcoming release of a big project at work:

No deployment woes

Wait, is that a bug? maybe…

Oh wait, no. Carry on

If you like it, or want to suggest your own haiku then feel free to tweet me.
